subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace in Jaipur was built by Maharaja Jai Singh II?
question_hi: जयपुर महाराजा जयसिंह II ने किस प्रमोबाईल बनी कीस्तानी मंगलवाला निविलें।
C_en: Cenotaph of Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is the palace built by Maharaja Jai Singh II. It is a famous landmark in Jaipur. Amer Fort and Cenotaph of Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II are also significant historical places in Jaipur, but Hawa Mahal is known for its unique architecture and design.
explanation_hi: महाराजा जैसिंग या सावा मंगलवाला निविलें।
